tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE movies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE actors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  birthdate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE movie_actors (
  movie_id INT,
  actor_id INT,
  role VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY (movie_id, actor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE movie_ratings (
  movie_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_movie FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movies(id)
)
